"...Phew.": "You sound tired."
"Something on your mind?"

"Ah, you scared me.
So you came here too..."

"I must have had my head in the clouds to not
notice your presence. Perhaps I am out of my usual sorts."

"...I come here often
when I want to be alone."

"When I hear the sound of the water, it feels like it
unravels all of the stress that's been tying up my mind."
"Didn't think you were the type."
"Is something the matter?"
"Well yes, even I have my slow days."

"Not really. ...Well, okay,
maybe that's not true."

"There are many things I
wish I had done differently."

"Lots of what-ifs. What if I did this instead of that?
What if I said this instead of that?"
"I'm always regretting my own actions..."

"Though Aina looks at me like
she thinks I'm amazing or something."

"I happen to have a lot of useful knowledge, but it doesn't
mean anything if I can't actually put it into practice."
"If anyone's amazing, it's her."

"To have experienced what she has experienced,
and yet still be able to look forward and keep moving on."

"All without having to close herself off,
much less lose herself in anger."

"If someone like her looks up to me like that,
I can't just go and betray her expectations of me."

"That's why, at least when I'm in front of her,
I want to be the strongest version of myself."

"Wait... Why am I telling
all of this to you...?"

"Hehehe. You're a mysterious
individual, aren't you?"

"I'm not even sure what goes through your head most of the time,
but it feels like I could talk to you about anything."

"That's probably why Aina also
places so much trust in you as well."

"...I hope you'll keep this
conversation a secret from Aina."

"One day, I'll definitely open up to her and
tell her everything that's on my mind... But not yet."
"Promise... Okay?"
